subject: Mathematics for IT-II
topics: Measures of Central Tendency: Mean, Median, Mode
Game Theory: Zero-Sum Games, Pure and Mixed Strategies
Project Management: PERT, CPM, Critical Path, Slack Calculation
course_outcomes: CO1: Understand probability concepts and Bayes’ theorem
CO2: Apply probability distributions to practical scenarios
CO3: Analyze data using descriptive statistics including skewness and kurtosis
CO4: Perform sampling and estimation including MLE
CO5: Apply operations research methods: game theory, inventory models, queuing
CO6: Demonstrate project management techniques using CPM and PERT
